thread.title: Grass-cutting probe: I won’t appear tomorrow, SGF writes Senate
thread.title_full: Grass-cutting probe: I won’t appear tomorrow, SGF writes Senate

author: John Abayomi
title: Grass-cutting probe: I won’t appear tomorrow, SGF writes Senate
text:
They are Promoted from collecting #20 to #50 .Congregations to them. d king 
worrior u are very stupid,if nt u would nt post disgust comment to those men who hv been risking their life for about 33years for u n i.Although they receiving salary bt does it corroboate with world policing,we should at least say sth gud abour them even for once. worrior 
I don’t call people names on this forum bcos it against the ways I was brought up.Try and read Proverbs 26 verse 4.May God bless you. Jonathan Peter 
Warrior, you are still suffering from unconscious mannerism. From your comment one can detect that Aninih was your uncle. worrior 
No matter what a wise man don’t join issues with a…. Please try and read proverbs 26-4.God bless you goodnight. Omotolaaraujo
